u-broker-finax-operations.name: Finax - Operations
u-broker-finax-operations.author: Capitally
u-broker-finax-operations.info:
To import your fees from Finax:

1. Login to [Finax](https://finax.eu/en/login)
1. Choose **Transactions** from the top menu
1. Choose **Operations** from the second-level menu
1. Choose a time period
1. Select the whole table and **copy** it (`Ctrl+C` / `Cmd+C`)
1. Click **paste** below

ℹ️ Dividends are not imported - they're generated by the app, but you will need to update their date and value manually if you need accuracy.

ℹ️ Money transfers are currently not imported.

ℹ️ You need to use the `Finax - Transactions` template to import transactions.
